title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 155.5 - Determinations and stays
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 155.5 - Determinations and stays

State Regulations
(a) The appeals board shall issue a decision
as promptly as possible after the date the appeal is finally
submitted. (b) If a final
disposition is not made within 30 days after an appeal has been finally
submitted, any suspension or revocation order being appealed will be
automatically stayed until a final disposition is made. A stay may also be
granted, in its discretion, by the appeals board upon the request of the
appellant as prescribed in section
262
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
155.5

Amended, New

York State Register March 19, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 11, eff. 3/19/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
